title: Keeper
description: "Finder—Quin—when did you find your voice?" Sofi asked.  "I have had it many years," I said with a sigh. "When it came, I was too afraid to speak."  "You knew too much," Wolter nodded.  "Too much," I agreed.  Siriaa, already in its death throes, is further damaged by a ruthless politician and a rogue wizard. Quin needs powerful help to save it.  Does such a power exist?  If so, will it answer her call?
author: Connie Suttle
